text:
CGI | Victoria, BC, Canada | Full-Time | ONSITE

CGI Group Inc. is a Canadian consulting firm specialising in government contracts. Perks include working from home, a good work-life balance, friendly co-workers, inclusive culture, and extensive opportunities across a variety of technology stacks.

If you apply, please add me (Dave Jarvis) as a referral because employees get a kick-back for each successful hire. Current opportunities include:

Intermediate Data Warehouse Developer - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Senior Data Warehouse Developer - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Java Developer (Intermediate - Senior) - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Senior Java Developer - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Intermediate Java Developer - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Intermediate Software QA Analyst - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Senior QA Analyst - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...

Senior Test Automation Engineer - https://cgi.njoyn.com/cgi/xweb/xweb.asp?clid=21001&page=jobd...
